subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan thought he had earned a prominent role on the United States World Cup team until the moment he was cut from the roster by Coach Jurgen Klinsmann.
snippet: Landon Donovan thought he had earned a prominent role on the United States World Cup team until the moment he was cut from the roster by Coach Jurgen Klinsmann.
